
{{alias}}( value )
    Test if a value is a parseable JSON string.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    y: boolean
        boolean indicating whether value is a parseable JSON string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = isJSON( '{"a":5}' )
    true

    > v = isJSON( '{a":5}' )
    false

    See Also
    --------
